ModMetaData.name: Motion Scanner
ModMetaData.author: TGPArcher
ModMetaData.description:
Have you ever wondered how to raiders manage to reach your colony unnoticed? Well this mod fixes that by adding a chance for your colonists to spot them valuable time before they reach your colony. But sometimes the raiders are more sneaky, to counter this a new long-range motion scanner has been added to the game which is increasing the chance to spot any raid. So draft your colonists and wait for their arrival.
More details: * Motion Scanner requires tech "Long-range mineral scanner" * Every colonist increases discovery chance with 0.5% * Every motion scanner increases discovery chance with 20% * Discovery chance is adjusted with difficulty, higher difficulties requiring more scanners or colonists
Requirements: This mod requires HugsLib in orderd to run. Install HugsLib and place it higher on the listitem
License: Do what you want, but give the author credit.
